info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:29PM EDT until August 15 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MECKLENBURG AND SOUTHEASTERN GASTON COUNTIES... At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Uptown Charlotte, or near Charlotte Douglas Airport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Central Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte, East Charlotte, Northwest Charlotte, Belmont, Freedom Park, The Plaza, Charlotte Douglas Airport and Steele Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
